import Backdrop from '../../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop' import Logo from '../../Logo/Logo' import NavigationItems from '../NavigationItems/NavigationItems' import React from 'react' import classes from './SideDrawer.module.css' const sideDrawer = props => { let attachedClasses = [classes['SideDrawer'], classes['Closed']] if (props.open) { attachedClasses = [classes['SideDrawer'], classes['Closed']] } return (
) } export default sideDrawer
